alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:22PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern DeSoto and southeastern Shelby Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 322 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southaven, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Germantown, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Memphis, Southeast Memphis, Lewisburg, Whitehaven, Lynchburg, Alden, Fairhaven, Cedarview, Parkway Village, Bright, Nesbit, Handy Corner, Capleville, Miller and Jago. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
